titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Auxiliary Services, Rockefeller University and Cornell Medical College Biomedical Seminars
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Auxiliary Services, Rockefeller University and Cornell Medical College Biomedical Seminars FA844

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-08-11 19:55:31 -0400.

revisiondesc.item: Paper finding aid converted to EAD/XML by AureXus in 2010. Imported into the Archvists’ Toolkit by Becky Robbins.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Auxiliary Services, Rockefeller University and Cornell Medical College Biomedical Seminars

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be closed to research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be closed to researchers at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/Head of Reference.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Each lecture has a specific set of use conditions.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for scholary research.

RAC is unable to provide access to obsolete media, due to the specialized equipment necessary to facilitate playback. When feasible, a digital surrogate may be created via special order. All applicable charges will apply. See RAC Head of Archival Services or RAC Head of Digital Programs for details.
